name: Button (Standard)
description: Use buttons to trigger actions and links.

name: Button (Primary)
description: Use buttons to trigger actions and links.

name: Button (Full width)
description: Use buttons to trigger actions and links.

name: Button (Compact)
description: Use default padding for most use cases, and compact for tables.

name: Button (Icon)
description: Use buttons to trigger actions and links.

name: Button (With icon)
description: Use buttons to trigger actions and links.

name: Button (Split)
description: Use buttons to trigger actions and links.

name: Button group
description: Use grouped buttons when there is a close relationship between a number of buttons.

name: Avatar (Person)
description: Use round avatars to quickly identify users.

name: Avatar (Container)
description: Use rounded square avatars to help identify large product entities like projects, spaces, groups, rooms, or repositories.

name: Avatar stack
description: User avatars can be grouped together in a stack or grid pattern to show multiple contributors.

name: Avatar grid
description: Use round avatars to quickly identify users.

name: Modal dialog
description: Use modal dialogs when you need a user response, to reveal critical information, or to show info without losing the overall context of a page.

name: Blanket
description: Blanket provides the overlay layer for components such as a modal dialog or a tooltip.

name: Select (40px)
description: Use selects to allow users to search and select options from a list.

name: Select (32px)
description: Use selects to allow users to search and select options from a list.

name: Select menu
description: An open select menu.

name: Lozenge
description: Use lozenges to highlight an item's status for quick recognition.

name: Text field (32px)
description: Use text fields in forms to help people enter, select, and search for text.

name: Text field (40px)
description: Use text fields in forms to help people enter, select, and search for text.

name: Text field (Search)
description: Use text fields in forms to help people enter, select, and search for text.

name: Text field (32px with helper)
description: Use text fields in forms to help people enter, select, and search for text.
symbolName: Text field / Base / 32px Default + Helper text

name: Text field (40px with helper)
description: Use text fields in forms to help people enter, select, and search for text.
symbolName: Text field / Base / 40px Default + Helper text

name: Text area
description: Use the text area field when the field requires a lot of information or a large description.
symbolName: Text field / Text area field / Default

name: Table (48px rows)
description: Use tables to logically structure content in a grid to make it easier to see relationships and to facilitate understanding.

name: Table (40px rows)
description: Use tables to logically structure content in a grid to make it easier to see relationships and to facilitate understanding.

name: Dropdown menu
description: Use drop-down menus to let users select an action or options from a set of choices.

name: Dropdown menu (Compact)
description: Use drop-down menus to let users select an action or options from a set of choices.

name: Global navigation
description: Use the global navigation to provide a consistent navigation experience between products.

name: Navigation next
description: Use navigation next to navigate inside of a product.

name: Flag
description: Use flags for messages containing confirmations, alerts, and acknowledgments that require minimal user interaction.

name: Flag (With actions)
description: Use flags for messages containing confirmations, alerts, and acknowledgments that require minimal user interaction.

name: Checkbox
description: Use checkboxes to allow people to select a number of options.

name: Checkbox group
description: Use checkboxes to allow people to select a number of options.

name: Section message (No title)
description: Section messages are used to alert users that something has happened in a section of the screen.

name: Section message (With title)
description: Section messages are used to alert users that something has happened in a section of the screen.

name: Spotlight
description: Use to introduce new features and functionality when on-boarding or change-boarding users.

name: Spotlight (With cover)
description: Use to introduce new features and functionality when on-boarding or change-boarding users.

name: Tooltip
description: Use tooltips to identify or add a small amount of information to an element.

name: Inline edit
description: The inline editor is designed to not stand out as an input when it is not focused or being interacted with.

name: Inline edit (With icon)
description: The inline editor is designed to not stand out as an input when it is not focused or being interacted with.

name: Tabs
description: Tabs are an easy way to organize content by grouping similar information on the same page.

name: Tag
description: Use tags to visually label UI objects for quick recognition and navigation.

name: Tag (Removable)
description: Use tags to visually label UI objects for quick recognition and navigation.
symbolName: Tags / Normal / Removable linked tag / Default

name: Tag (Avatar)
description: Use tags to visually label UI objects for quick recognition and navigation.
symbolName: Tags / Avatar round / Linked tag / Default

name: Tag (Avatar, removable)
description: Use tags to visually label UI objects for quick recognition and navigation.
symbolName: Tags / Avatar round / Removable linked tag / Default

name: Radio group
description: Use radio groups when you want the person to select a single option from a short list.

name: Banner
description: Use banners at the top of the screen to display critical messaging about loss of data, functionality, or important site-wide information that affects the user's ability to use the product.

name: User benefit modal
description: Use to introduce existing users to a new experience.

name: Badge (Double digits)
description: Badges contain numeric values and indicate a running tally, such as the number of unread messages in a room.

name: Badge (Single digit)
description: Badges contain numeric values and indicate a running tally, such as the number of unread messages in a room.

name: Badge (Max digits)
description: Badges contain numeric values and indicate a running tally, such as the number of unread messages in a room.

name: Mention
description: Used to @mention a user in a text field or form.

name: Page header (Full)
description: The page header is a pattern that helps define the uppermost part a webpage or product.
symbolName: Page-header / Title with breadcrumb and bottom bar [144px H]

name: Page header (Title with actions)
description: The page header is a pattern that helps define the uppermost part a webpage or product.

name: Page header (Title)
description: The page header is a pattern that helps define the uppermost part a webpage or product.

name: Page header (Bottom bar)
description: The page header is a pattern that helps define the uppermost part a webpage or product.

name: Toggle (16px, checked)
description: Toggles are a quick way to view and switch between enabled or disabled states.

name: Toggle (16px, unchecked)
description: Toggles are a quick way to view and switch between enabled or disabled states.

name: Toggle (20px, checked)
description: Toggles are a quick way to view and switch between enabled or disabled states.

name: Toggle (20px, unchecked)
description: Toggles are a quick way to view and switch between enabled or disabled states.

name: Spinner
description: Use spinners to let users know that content is being loaded and will take an indeterminate amount of time.

name: Quick search
description: Renders search results in navigation.

name: Quick search item
description: A single search result in quick search.

name: Breadcrumbs
description: Breadcrumbs help users see their current location in relation to the rest of the website or application.

name: Breadcrumbs (With icons)
description: Breadcrumbs help users see their current location in relation to the rest of the website or application.

name: Datetime picker
description: Use this field to allow users to select a date and/or time.

name: Datetime picker (Calendar)
description: Select a date from a date picker.

name: Datetime picker (Time)
description: Select a time from a time picker.

name: Date picker
description: Use to select a single date from the calendar dialog.

name: Time picker
description: Use the time picker to select a time from the single-select menu.

name: Pagination (3 pages)
description: Use to help people move between a large number of items that are distributed across multiple pages whenever there are too many results to show at once.

name: Pagination (10 pages)
description: Use to help people move between a large number of items that are distributed across multiple pages whenever there are too many results to show at once.

name: Range
description: Use to select a numeric value between a pre-determined minimum and maximum.
